snippet: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the blast in the Shiite neighborhood of Sadr City, which came just after dawn as shoppers were stocking up for the weekend.
abstract: Truck bomb explodes at food market in Baghdad's Shiite neighborhood Sadr City, killing about 60 people and injuring more than 100; Islamic State claims responsibility.

byline.original: By OMAR AL-JAWOSHY and TIM ARANGO
byline.contributor: Omar Al-Jawoshy reported from Baghdad, and Tim Arango from Istanbul. Falih Hassan and Ahmed Salah contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the blast in the Shiite neighborhood of Sadr City, which came just after dawn as shoppers were stocking up for the weekend.

headline.main: Bomb Claimed by ISIS Kills Dozens in Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Bomb Claimed by ISIS Kills Dozens in Baghdad

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
